title: Initialize git repository and push to GitHub
description: Create a git repository for the Hydromatic project, initialize with proper .gitignore, create initial commit with WiFiManager implementation, and push to a remote GitHub repository for version control and collaboration.
acceptance_criteria: Git repository initialized in project root
Initial commit created with all source code
README.md documents project overview and setup

verification.test_results: Git repository initialized with proper .gitignore, created initial commit with all source code, configured GitHub remote (https://github.com/ColinG86/hydromatic.git), and successfully pushed to remote. README.md documents project setup and task management workflow.
